channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Man The Left Calls A ‘Nazi’ Just Signed A Peace Deal Protecting Millions Of Jews
item.description: President Donald Trump was heralded Monday as a hero by a grateful Israel that rejoiced in the return of the last living hostages.

item.title: FDA’s Approval of Mifepristone Generic Raises Troubling Questions
item.description: For one: Why did the administration not put up a bigger fight on this issue?

item.title: LISTEN: Man leaves disturbing voicemail for ICE agents: ‘Hope they’re doxxed’
item.description: An anti-ICE caller left a disturbing voicemail taunting ICE agents, saying he hopes “every one of those lawless c----" gets “doxxed one by one."

item.title: Why the Supreme Court may choose to uphold Trump’s tariffs: ‘It would be incredibly disruptive to unscramble those eggs’
item.description: Reversing Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs stands to upend billions in trade flows and test the limits of presidential power.

item.title: Has a U.S. President Ever Been More Pro-Israel?
item.description: Isolationists and malicious enemies of Israel are part of Trump’s coalition, but the president absolutely does not number himself among them.

item.title: ‘It was the internet then, it is AI now’: IMF upgrades U.S. growth outlook but sees ‘echoes’ of late ’90s dot-com boom
item.description: IMF chief economist Pierre-Olivier Gourinchas said “the tariff shock is here, and it is further dimming already weak growth prospects."

item.title: Records: Blue States Can’t Provide Any Evidence To Defend Anchor Baby Citizenship

item.title: The Return of the Hostages Is a Triumph for Both President Trump and Israel
item.description: Trump refused to prevent Israel from winning.

item.title: Goldman tells staff it will cut more jobs as AI saves costs
item.description: The bank plans to “constrain headcount growth through the end of the year” and a “limited reduction in roles across the firm,” an internal memo says.
